column3:
option to control aerosol interaction;

=0 : no aerosol interaction

=1 : aerosol interaction with only MSKF

=2 : aerosol interaction with both MSKF 
and Morrison
factor to multiply with aerosol amount

number of aerosol species in global aerosol
data (10 for CESM input); value is set
automatically

number of levels in global aerosol data (30
for CESM input); value is set automatically
